attributes.action: ban charging for television in hospitals and charge prisoners for television instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would urge the prme minister to think about the fact that while prisoners get their TV for free those in hospital ( possibly as a result of those in prison) have to pay for it.  We think that TV is a life line to most people recovering in hospital and should threfore not be charged for.
